summary: Diff implements editable Quick Add demographics preview (with apply-to-form), new-case-only default checklist selections for two items, checklist-to-todos persistence + UI section, and case-list sorting controls. Import/export UI is present on the case list page, but backend import/export APIs and ID-collision/nextId handling are not evidenced in the provided backend diff excerpt, so REQ-13 appears incomplete based on available evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes APIs to export all cases and to import cases; import updates persistent canister state; import handles IDs safely (no collisions) and maintains correct behavior for creating new cases after import (e.g., next ID increments properly).
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend includes import/export actions and hooks references, but the backend diff excerpt (backend/main.mo shown) does not include any export/import methods or logic for merging imported cases and updating nextId safely. Without those APIs/logic evidenced, REQ-13 cannot be confirmed as implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Camera-based OCR workflow for Quick Add Demographics (capture photo, extract text via Shape Detection API TextDetector, auto-parse).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-10 only requires editable preview of parsed demographics and applying edited values to the form; it does not request camera/OCR capture features.

hallucinated_features.description: Ability to manually add and delete to-do items from the Case Detail page (not only derived from checklist-at-create time).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-12 requires saving checked checklist items as to-dos on create and managing/toggling completion for those to-dos; it does not explicitly request arbitrary add/delete of to-dos via UI actions.
